Edges-Weird -- Male Human Heroic Rogue
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d12 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d8 Taunt: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d8
Gambling: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Draconic; Gnoll; Gnome
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: -2 using mechanical and electrical devices, critical failure breaks device
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Healer: May reroll Healing
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 12; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (8 points): Beast Bond; Beast Master; Champion; Danger Sense; Healer; Luck; Rogue; Scavenger Hindrances: All Thumbs; Big Mouth; Enemy; Vow Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Big Mouth: Cannot keep secrets
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
Luck: +1 Benny each session
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 5 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Sap (d4+d4); Staff (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0); Whip (d4+d4)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Champion: +2 damage on supernaturally opposed alignment
Scavenger: May recover knowledge or equipment 1/encounter
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Staff Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Whip Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
